title: Roundup: SiFive’s Big Layoffs, AlmaLinux Waiting for RHEL, Fedora 39 Delayed Twice, and More…
description:
Also included in this FOSS Week in Review: The Linux Foundation’s upcoming Technical Advisory Board election. In my part of the woods, we’re in something…

The post Roundup: SiFive’s Big Layoffs, AlmaLinux Waiting for RHEL, Fedora 39 Delayed Twice, and More… appeared first on FOSS Force.
